title: DBMS Level 1 â€” Introduction to Databases
concept: MCQs on basic database and DBMS concepts.

challenges.title: Q1: What is a Database?
challenges.description: Which of the following best describes a database?
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) A collection of programs that manage hardware
b) A collection of interrelated data stored together
c) A single text file with random data
d) A backup copy of operating system files
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d

challenges.title: Q2: What is a DBMS?
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) Database Managing System
b) Data Backup Management System
c) Database Management System
d) Data Base Main Storage
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d
